generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including crosswalks and directional arrows, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, separated by bollards and where pedestrians are walking, is a sidewalk.
- building: The large structure on the left side of the image with windows and architectural features is a building.
- wall: The stone wall visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk, is a wall.
- fence: The metal fence with vertical bars, located behind the stone wall on the right side of the image, is a fence.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible throughout the image, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with a white arrow, a red and white striped sign, and a blue parking sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass visible on the sidewalk near the stone wall on the right side of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as a pale, overcast area.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including a man standing near the road sign on the left, pedestrians on the sidewalk on the right, and individuals walking further down the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible in the image, including a silver sedan driving away, a silver SUV parked on the right, and other vehicles in the distance.
- truck: Two trucks are visible in the image: a black UPS truck on the left and a blue truck further down the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
